kpi.name: msc_2073a

kpi_info.title: Average UNKNOWN Attached Subscribers per HLR
kpi_info.use: Average number of UNKNOWN attached subscribers per HLR during the measurement period.
kpi_info.formula:
For OBJECT level:
SUM( AVG_NBR_HOME_SUBS_UNKNOWN - AVG_NBR_HOME_SUBS_UNKNOWN_DET )

For TIME level:
AVG( AVG_NBR_HOME_SUBS_UNKNOWN - AVG_NBR_HOME_SUBS_UNKNOWN_DET )

Counters from AGGREGATED view(s)

kpi.kpi_alias: Avg UNKNOWN Attached Subsc per HLR
